document.full_text: chris bosh stepped up to help the star-studded miami heat snap a five-game losing streak with a 94-88 win over the two-time defending nba champion los angeles lakers on thursday.
document.title: bosh fires heat to victory over lakers
lines_and_colors: chris bosh stepped up to help the star-studded miami heat snap a five-game losing streak with a 94-88 win over the two-time defending nba champion los angeles lakers on thursday.
